Container.Name: Namecheap_DDNS
Container.Overview:
This simple container will update a namecheap dynamic dns domain. You must set an 'A + Dynamic DNS Record' for the host and enable Dynamic DNS in the manage page for your domain.
For more info see: https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/29/11/how-do-i-use-a-browser-to-dynamically-update-the-hosts-ip/
Container.Description:
This simple container will update a namecheap dynamic dns domain. You must set an 'A + Dynamic DNS Record' for the host and enable Dynamic DNS in the manage page for your domain.
For more info see: https://www.namecheap.com/support/knowledgebase/article.aspx/29/11/how-do-i-use-a-browser-to-dynamically-update-the-hosts-ip/

Config.Name: HOST
Config.Description: This is the host to be updated. e.g. 'www.'

Config.Name: DOMAIN
Config.Description: This is the domain to be updated. e.g. yourdomain.tld

Config.Name: PASSWORD
Config.Description: Your Dynamic DNS password. NOT your namecheap password.
